ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Godstorm: Hercules Payne
ComicInfo.Summary:
Don't miss this final issue! After taking a stand against Taylor and his thugs, Andre Payne has drawn the attention of Venus, an evil goddess who wants him dead. Gods and gangsters clash in the explosive finale of the origin story of Hercules Payne.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Paolo Pantalena & Ross A. Campbell | 1 | B | Cover B | Eric J & Alessia Nocera | 2 | C | Cover C | Vincenzo Cucca & Ylenia Di Napoli | 3 |
